title: "Parkinson’s Disease Gets Diagnostic Help From Artificial Intelligence"
excerpt: "Parkinson’s Disease is one of several degenerative diseases in our neurologic system. It has a celebrity patient, Michael J Fox. Still, with a million patients living with the disease in the US and sixty thousand new diagnoses annually it lacks a biomarker to aid in early detection."
